message:
看了兩節的數學書
1. Basic topology section 4.2, concerning the identification space and identification map. Indeed a very pleasing section. The important concept of quotients is introduced, but in a view point of topology. It tells us that the projection function is just a special case of identification map. Identification maps have just the good properties as projections'. But the proof of the theorem is quite terse and a little bit ambiguous. Additionally, the notation is quite annoying. The quotient space should be written as X/~. Sucker!

Given an arbitary function, we can naturally define a equivalent relation. Sequently, we can define an identification map with the respective to the projection function.
And if the function is an identification map in the first place, the X/~ is homeomorphic to Y. Nice.

2. 数理逻辑的证明及其限度
section 2.6.  It is about 命题公式的推演系统. 一個模型, 叫什麽希爾伯特類型的系統. 也很精彩, 但沒有那麽精彩.
主要是解決了我的一種 ambiguity, 要不是我們那講課太垃圾了!

還有就是系統内 provable 的記號是 \vdash, 我在另一本書裏看到的, 如果說 sigma is tableau provable 那麽記爲 \vdash \sigma.
這裏的 \vdash 是同一個記號嗎? 我一直在想這個問題. 我是否能夠將系統的證明和 tableaux 證明聯係起來呢? 是不是説, tableaux 實際上是證明的另一種表述形式, 但是我如果如何將前件 (premise) 擴展到 tableaux 上呢? 應該是可以根據前件剪去一些 tableau 的分支.
Fascinating.
title: 今天 (以及昨天) 看了啥
userSign: (目前正在寻找生活强度的来源)
